data.8:
1. If you exceed the online payment limit for a single day or a single large amount of recharge, you can use other recharge methods
  2. Please invite members to China UnionPay to open a shortcut function to make your payment more convenient.
  3. If you encounter failures such as deposit scan code failure, please try to refresh and try again, and contact customer service to use other alternative channels
data.1:
1. If you exceed the online payment limit for a single day or a single large amount of recharge, you can use other recharge methods
  2. Please invite members to China UnionPay to open a shortcut function to make your payment more convenient.
  3. If you encounter failures such as deposit scan code failure, please try to refresh and try again, and contact customer service to use other alternative channels
